question: “Tamso Ma Jyotirgamaya” ” Lead us from Darkness to Light” , this comes from which among the following Upanishadas?
explanation: “Tamso Ma Jyotirgamaya” ” Lead us from Darkness to Light” , this comes from Brahadaranyaka Upanishad. It is one of the Principal Upanishads and one of the first Upanishadic scriptures of Hinduism. A key scripture to various schools of Hinduism, the Brihadaranyaka Upanisad is tenth in the Muktikā or "canon of 108 Upanishads".
